text.tspan: Hoang Le
hoanglva@gmail.com | (503) 860 6899 | Portland, OR 97266
Portfolio: hoanglva.dev | GitHub: hoangle4 | LinkedIn: hoang-le-20b79a177
With a web design and development background, I look at each new problem as fun challenge and will tackle any project,
using anything from non-frameworks to cutting edge technologies. If I haven't used it, I will learn it quickly and efficiently.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
JavaScript | React |Angular | jQuery | CSS | HTML | Bootstrap | Redux | Handlebars | React-Native | Ionic | Electron
Node|Java | Express | SQL | Sequelize | MongoDB |Mongoose| Firebase | MVC | Git | Heroku | Axios
APPLICATIONS BUILT
WeedmeMaps | GitHub | ~3,500 lines of code
Team Lead / JS Specialist | 3-Person Team
We built a responsive map gets user location and displays local cannabis dispensaries.
⋅ Architected the full-stack application; Built React front-end (all pages and components); Mapbox API. Integrated
React-Context; Connected SQL database; Coded back-end routing; Deployed the app.
⋅ Mentored teammates to increase productivity; Organized production schedule; Coordinated Git merges.
TheGiftHub | GitHub | ~3,000 lines of code
Team Lead / JS Specialist | 3-Person Team
We created a gift registry for all occasions allows users to create, view and share registry and claim gifts.
⋅ Architected the full-stack application; Built React front-end (all pages and components); Integrated React-Context; Con
nected MongoDB; Coded back-end routing; Deployed the app.
⋅ Mentored teammates to increase productivity; Organized production schedule; Coordinated Git merges.
Hidden Gems | GitHub | ~5,000 lines of code
Solo
Web built a small social media platform that allows users to post interesting places around the city on a map.
⋅ Architected the full-stack application; Built React front-end (all pages and components); Integrated React-Context;
Mapbox API; Personal Profile; Individual Dashboard; Messaging; Connected MongoDB; Coded back-end routing; Deployed
the app.
⋅ Mentored teammates to increase productivity; Organized production schedule; Coordinated Git merges.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Transformation Now Inc.|Full Stack Developer | Brice, OH (remote)
August 2019 – Present
Architect of application; create patreon personal page and design resources links
Create mock-ups layouts
Develop React - Redux front-end and Nodejs backend
Custom DNS | AWS Deployment
Give clients support throughout the project
Lace Nails | Full Stack Developer| Lake Oswego, OR
Jan 2018 - Present
Architect of the application; create employee personal page and reviews
Create mock-ups layouts
Develop React – React-Context front-end and Nodejs backend
Custom DNS | AWS Deployment
Self | Freelance Web developer | Portland, OR

Register domain | Config hosting | Create Website | Deploy to Hosting
WordPress | PHP website | JavaScript Website
Adobe Photoshop | Adobe Illustrator | FileZilla | Sketch
EDUCATION
UO | Full-Stack Coding Boot Camp | Portland, OR
